title: VWAP Mean Reversion Strategy
hypothesis: Price tends to revert to VWAP after extreme deviations (>2 standard deviations), especially during low-volume periods
counterparty: Momentum traders who chase extended moves away from fair value
edgeSource: Market microstructure - VWAP represents institutional fair value, extreme deviations attract mean reversion
source: Market microstructure research + prop firm strategies
